channel.title: Adaptability on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Adaptability on funPlantGenes

item.title: Ghd7
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os07g15770 RAPdb gene ID: Os07g0261200 Gene Symbol: Ghd7 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GmEID1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.03G214300 Gene Symbol: GmEID1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEID1 acts as a bridge to link the light signals perceived by E3/E4 to the activity of EC.

item.title: GmHY2a;Gmlin1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G304700 Gene Symbol: GmHY2a Gmlin1 Gene Name: Glycine max long internode 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Mutation of GmHY2a results in failure of the de-etiolation response under both red and far-red light.

item.title: GmPLP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g022000 Gene Symbol: GmPLP1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmPLP1 negatively regulates soybean resistance to high light stress by modulating photosynthetic capacity and reactive oxygen species accumulation in a blue light-dependent manner.

item.title: ORF355
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ORF355 Gene Name: ORF355 Genome: Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: ORF355 confers enhanced salinity stress adaptability to S-type cytoplasmic male sterility maize by modulating the mitochondrial metabolic homeostasis.

item.title: OsbZIP01;OsRE1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g07880 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0174000 Gene Symbol: OsbZIP01 OsRE1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsZFP350
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g20930 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0286100 Gene Symbol: OsZFP350 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PmCBF03
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PmCBF03 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus mume Functional Descriptions: A low-temperature transcription factor PmCBF03 on chromosome 7 through adaptive analysis of populations at different altitudes, which has an early termination single nucleotide polymorphism mutation.

item.title: TaTAP46
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5D02G142100 Gene Symbol: TaTAP46 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.
